Posts.Content: Jul 6, 2016 10:16PM DebHen wrote: We interviewed 4 surgeons - Dr. Zent, Dr. Canavan, Dr. Leitch and a newcomer, Dr. Gennieve Hughes. Chose Dr. Leitch. She is a top rated surgeon at a top rated research and teaching hospital, UT Southwestern Medical Center. However, don't expect much in the bedside manner category. Dr. Hughes was our second choice. She is at Methodist in Richardson-which I wouldn't recommend, but she also has privileges at Baylor Plano. Good luck - it is a daunting process. Debbie
Posts.Title: Surgeons in Dallas, TX Leitch vs. Ganaraj vs. Rachel Zent texasgirl2016 woodstock99
